title: Cobalt City Double Feature
description: Timid Pirate pays homage to the popular 20th century double story format in this 21st century ebook edition.The Place Between by Minerva Zimmerman (“Muffin Everlasting” and “Apples and Arrows”) mixes Norse mythology and superheroes as Tera as she forges her own identity as Tempest, an aspect of Thor.Eye for an Eye by Erik Scott de Bie (Shadowbane, “Vengeance on the Layover”) shakes up the happy family life of Cobalt City’s brightest star, Stardust.
author: Erik Scott de Bie
